price: Dizendo: "Apenas, alimentamo-vos por amor de Allah. Não desejamos de vós nem recompensa nem agradecimento.
arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: innamā nuṭ'ʿimukum liwajhi al-lahi lā nurīdu minkum jazāan walā shukūran
